item.description:
1.0.0: The Official Release

Thaw has reached its first stable milestone! This release consolidates all the progress from the beta period into a polished, reliable menu bar manager.

Latest Improvements (since beta 4):

  • Enhanced Reliability: Stabilized HIDEventManager logic to prevent "show on hover" and "show on click" from stopping after repeated use and prevent saving chevron divider position which could leave Thaw in an unusable state.
  • UI Polish: Condensed the menu bar tooltip for a cleaner look and added explicit double-click instructions.
  • System Safety: Improved thread safety by synchronizing access to the cursor hide count.
  • Apple Menu Fix: Refined synthetic press offsets to ensure Thaw never accidentally triggers the Apple menu.

Highlights from the Journey to 1.0:

  • The Big Thaw: Successfully forked and rebranded with a new identity, app icon, and independent bundle ID (com.stonerl.Thaw).
  • Ice Migration: Built-in support to import your old settings and control item positions from Ice.
  • Advanced Control: Introduced "Double-Click to Reveal" for always-hidden items and "Smart Rehide" strategies.
  • Modern macOS Support: Optimized for stability on macOS 26.
  • Performance: Faster icon caching, display-aware state refreshing, and thread-safe operations.

Known Issues:

If you are currently on macOS 14 or 15, please be aware that Thaw currently has some known bugs regarding temporary icons in the floating Thaw bar.

I am actively investigating these issues and will release a fix as soon as possible. You can track the progress of this issue here: GitHub Issue #1.

Thank you for all the feedback during the beta period that made this release possible!

item.title: 1.0.0-beta.4
item.description:
1.0.0-beta.4: Precision & Control

New Features:

  • Double-Click to Reveal: You can now double-click the Thaw icon to instantly reveal your "always-hidden" menu bar section.

Improvements & Fixes:

  • Smarter Temporary Items: Temporarily shown icons now rehide immediately when you switch applications, in addition to the standard timer.
  • macOS 14/15 Stability: Fixed an issue where rehiding items could accidentally trigger the Apple menu.
  • Icon Placement: Improved logic to prevent "jiggling" and placement errors on older macOS versions when the control item is at the far left.
  • Search Cleanup: The search field now automatically clears itself whenever you close the search panel.
  • Reliable Migration: Enhanced the Ice settings detection logic to ensure the importer only appears when valid data is found.
  • UI Refinement: Cleaned up copyright strings and optimized how items return to their original sections after being temporarily visible.
